opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Postal Telegraph Cable Co. v. Baltimore

opinion:
156 U.S. 210 (1895)

POSTAL TELEGRAPH CABLE COMPANY
v.
BALTIMORE.

No. 828.

Supreme Court of United States.

Submitted January 21, 1895.
Decided January 28, 1895.
ERROR TO THE COURT OF APPEALS OF THE STATE OF MARYLAND.

*211 Mr. Thomas G. Hayes and Mr. William S. Bryan, Jr., for the motion.

Mr. George H. Bates opposing.

THE CHIEF JUSTICE: The judgment is affirmed upon the authority of St. Louis v. Western Union Tel. Co., 148 U.S. 92.
